name: Eric Van Albert's Pro Boater
description:
Another Secret Santa game. Make it all the way to the top by ramping off the Watertown dam and pulling sick stunts.

Controls: WASD to move when not doing tricks. Hit the dam to start doing tricks!

Tricks: WASD to do flips and spins, arrow keys to hold special tricks.

Unlock upgrades for your boat and become the Pro Boater
